definition: to comment/to evaluate
to discuss/to comment/to criticize/to judge/to choose (by public appraisal)
to persuade
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: Professor Hsiao highly recommended this book and provided detailed annotation on its organization and style.
sentences.chinese: 蕭先生鄭重推介此書，且逐詞評說其章法體例。

sentences.english: As for the results, just leave it to the later generation to comment.
sentences.chinese: 至於成果，那就留於後人評說吧。

sentences.english: "I'm very, very optimistic about our future, " Page said in brief comments.
sentences.chinese: “我對我們的未來非常非常樂觀”佩奇這樣簡評說。

sentences.english: The same stage, there is inter-generational cross-border inter-Korean intercontinental people to note Pan Jinlian.
sentences.chinese: 同一舞臺上，有跨朝跨代跨國跨洲的人來評說潘金蓮。

sentences.english: But she criticised the lack of reference to the importance of science communication.
sentences.chinese: 但是她批評說該宣言沒有提及科學傳播的重要性。

sentences.english: McKen criticises the lack of explication of what the term "areas" means.
sentences.chinese: 麥肯批評說對“區域”一詞的含義缺少解釋。

definition: to comprehend (new things) by analogy
to judge
proposition/argument
conclusion/judgment/verdict
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
to make a show of being original or unconventional (idiom)
lit. to put Zhang's hat on Li's head/to attribute sth to the wrong person (idiom)/to confuse one thing with another
to mention sth without elaborating (idiom); not giving details
tied up in a bundle on a high shelf/to put sth on the back burner/no longer a high priority
to praise
to make an irrelevant comparison or interpretation (idiom)
to amuse oneself/to play with/to tease
to talk about this and that (idiom); to ramble incoherently
to make a story or theory consistent/to give a plausible explanation/to plug the holes in one's story
to infer/to judge/inference/judgment/conclusion
to guide patiently and systematically (idiom)
